General.Name: Lu Thai Textile
General.Description: Lu Thai Textile Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells yarn-dyed fabrics and dyeing fabrics for shirts and garments. It offers combed cotton and blended yarns; yarns and fabrics of cotton, fiber, silk, wool, chemical fiber, and other materials; shirts; and dyeing fabrics, including non-iron, white, multi-component, digital printing, stretch, and pant fabrics. The company provides its products under the LUTHAI, LT"GRFF, BESSSHIRT, and CAVAD brands. It has operations in Mainland China, Hong Kong, Japan, South Korea, rest of Southeast Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Zibo, the People's Republic of China.
